verses.name: 1 Samuel 6:19
verses.text: And he smote the men of Beth–shemesh, because they had looked into the ark of the Lord, even he smote of the people fifty thousand and threescore and ten men: and the people lamented, because the Lord had smitten many of the people with a great slaughter.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 6:20
verses.text: And the men of Beth–shemesh said, Who is able to stand before this holy Lord God? and to whom shall he go up from us?
